name: Gravitos:prologue
description:
2034 year. You wake up in the GRAVIToS Corporation laboratory and all you want is to leave these abandoned ruins as soon as possible ... If technology is abandoned, this does not mean that it will not be able to adapt...

Gravitos: prologue - This is the debut project of n3koHype Studio. In this game, you will have to solve interesting physics-based puzzles. You will have to master the "Ball Cannon" to skillfully overcome obstacles.
